titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Maiestie, at Whitehall, on Easter day last, 1614. By the Bishop of Elie, His Maiesties almoner
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with part of a woodcut frame.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
